bibl.title: Viewing the Holy Utensils (P. Ox. V, 840).
bibl.note: Fragment of a non-canonical gospel, P. Oxy. V, 840 (= van Haelst 585). The author was well-informed about the workings of the Temple ritual. The polemical exchange is a rare instance of Jesus' participation in Pharisaic criticism of the overemphasis of external purity on the part of the priests.
Schwartz Daniel R., Viewing the Holy Utensils (P. Ox. V, 840).
